resources.string: There are no previous queries, to perform one simply tap the microphone icon below
There was a problem getting the forecast, please try again later
Couldn\'t retrieve location, please try again
Sorry, but the app doesn\'t have permissions to access this feature. If you want to use the feature, please reinstall the application and grant the requested permission
Location permissions are not granted, the weather forecast will be displayed for default location (Barcelona, Spain)
Could not set location, please specify country
Last location is unknown, please activate GPS
